Class EntitiesFactory

java.lang.Object
  fr.n7.saceca.u3du.model.ai.EntitiesFactory

public class EntitiesFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A factory to create "entities" (i.e. reactive objects and agents).

Author:
Sylvain Cambon

createAgent

public Agent createAgent(java.lang.String modelName)
                  throws MalformedObjectException
Creates a new agent according to its model. The agent has to be manually added to the world.

Parameters:
modelName - the model name
Returns:
the world object instance, null if a problem arose.
Throws:
MalformedObjectException - If the object was not well-formed.

createWorldObject

public WorldObject createWorldObject(java.lang.String modelName)
Creates a new WorldObject object according to its model. The object has to be manually added to the world.

Returns:
the world object instance, null if a problem arose.
